channel.title: Government contract on FinanClub

item.title: RKLB
item.description: score:50 Chances: Rocket Lab USA has secured a significant $515 million U.S. government contract, indicating a strong potential for revenue growth and market expansion. The successful launch of its 42nd Electron rocket and deployment of a satellite for a Japan-based company demonstrates Rocket Lab’s continued execution and expansion of its space services and systems.
